column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Jasmine - Thank you very much for the stars. We greatly appreciate it. Also
column2: we will have a word with our hired security staff. I'm not sure why you were made to feel any way besides comfortable in our house. For future reference
column3: never hesitate to inform an employee if there is any issue with any aspect of our business. We appreciate your understanding
column4: and we look forward to serving you again soon!
